data.title: Carol Jackson
data.meta_description: The family of Carol Jackson will celebrate her life of 65 years at 10:00 am on Thursday, February 11, 2021, at Monterey Baptist Church. data.text: The family of Carol Jackson will celebrate her life of 65 years at 10:00 am on Thursday, February 11, 2021, at Monterey Baptist Church. Her family will host a time of fellowship and remembrance from 6:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m., Wednesday, February 10, 2021, at Lake Ridge Chapel and Memorial Designers. She passed on Friday, February 5, 2021. In support of the health of her family, face coverings are mandatory while attending the service. The Jackson family invites you to view her live-streamed service on this page and available for 90 days. We ask you to sign her virtual guestbook and download her memorial keepsake folder to your device for printing.On March 29, 1955, Carol Ann was born to Jesse and Ruby Everett in Seminole, Texas. Carol married Mike Jackson, on November 29, 1974, at the First Baptist Church in Seminole, Texas.Survivors include her husband, Mike Jackson; their children, Tosha (Curt) Zabka, Cory (Karri) Jackson, Dustin (Stormy) Jackson, and Blake (Sarah) Jackson; grandchildren, Kaylee Jackson, Camryn Zabka, Courtney Jackson, Faith Zabka, Hayden Jackson, Grayson Jackson, Steven Jackson, Nolan Jackson, Corbin Jackson; sister, Judy Mutschler.Mrs. Jackson is preceded in death by her parents, brothers, Frankie, and Phillip Everett.
